publications.title: Protein Knotting by Active Threading of Nascent Polypeptide Chain Exiting from the Ribosome Exit Channel
publications.journal: The Journal of Physical Chemistry B
publications.abstract: In this work we show, that on-ribosome cotranslation folding may be a way to form even very deep knots in proteins.

publications.title: GapRepairer: a server to model a structural gap and validate it using topological analysis
publications.abstract: In this work we introduce GapRepairer - a server to model a structural gap and validate it using topological analysis

publications.title: Genus trace reveals the topological complexity and domain structure of biomolecules
publications.abstract: In this work we introduce the genus trace - a topological tool to reveal the complexity and domain structure of biomolecules

publications.title: The APS-bracket – A topological tool to classify lasso proteins, RNAs and other tadpole-like structures
publications.abstract: In this work we introduce the APS-bracket - a topological tool to classify lasso proteins, RNAs and other tadpole-like structures

publications.title: The exclusive effects of chaperonin on the behavior of proteins with 5<sub>2</sub> knot
publications.abstract: In this work we show that chaperonin can stabilize proteins with 5<sub>2</sub> knot and we study the folding pathway of protein with 5<sub>2</sub> knot
